cause.description:
The United States is strong because of its pluralistic and diverse society. Individual rights and civil liberties are an important part of this fabric. However hate and hate crimes threaten our society and undermine our core principles. This cause is designed to call attention the dangers of hate in the United States and promote a tolerant and understanding society.
1. America's strength is in its pluralism and diversity
2. Hate is unacceptable, hurtful and undermines our national values
3. United States should adopt hate crimes laws that adequately protect individuals and communities
cause.mission: stop hate, promote tolerance, and build a more understanding and pluralistic society
cause.name: STOP HATE
